uploadForm.title: JSON Translation Tool
uploadForm.loadingText: If you're stuck on a value for a while, wait a bit; don't refresh, as upstream is loaded and may recover in about a minute.
uploadForm.modelInfo: Uses gpt-4o-mini to translate with DeepSeek. Never heard of DeepSeek? It's like gpt-4o-mini, but cheaper and faster. Minecraft fine-tunes gpt-4o-mini v3 for full English translations.
uploadForm.emailContact: Email h{'@'}lvjia.cc to contact me, more requests means more development
uploadForm.privacyDesc: We only collect anonymous access statistics, no personal information
uploadForm.description: Upload a JSON file to automatically translate it to Chinese. Please ensure it is a flat JSON file. Choose a translation method before uploading; defaults to English to Chinese.
uploadForm.dntEnabled: Do Not Track enabled, we won't collect any stats
dntEnabledPrevious: Enabled DNT, though previously consented, now DNT is enabled, no stats will be collected
uploadForm.thankYou: Thank you for your support! Your ID is:
uploadForm.tutorialContent2: In the assets folder, there will be a non-Minecraft-named folder. Open it, and the json files inside are the language files.
uploadForm.tutorialContent4: If you unzipped it, rezip it as a standard zip, ensuring the top-level directory is not a single folder, and it should be zipped correctly. Rename the extension to jar.
uploadForm.privacyModalContent: Counts real users, does not share with any third parties.
uploadForm.tutorialContent1: Download a compression tool like 7-zip, then right-click the jar file to open or extract it. The assets folder contains the mod's resource files.
uploadForm.tutorialContent3: Upload to this site, save after translating, rename to zh_cn.json, and drag it in.
uploadForm.privacyModalSubtitle: What to do with collected data?
jsonError1: JSON must be an object, not an array or other type
uploadForm.serverError: I had some weird errors, but restarting the server fixed it. Very weird.
uploadForm.recaptchaScoreTooLow: Recaptcha score too low, please reverify, score:
jsonError2: Value must be a string; nested objects or arrays are not allowed
